goals.title: Goals
goals.body: I would like to work in an innovative, high-paced environment where new ideas and creative thinking is welcome.

items.title: Next9 Adept
items.description: Next9 is a mentorship program aimed for young professionals with high ambitions. Each year 9 students from all over the country are elected to be mentored for 6 months.

items.title: Netlight Student Ambassador
items.description: My main goal is to help Netlight find the sharpest minds in Linkoping.

items.title: ANWP, Sole Proprietor
items.description: I have developed websites based on WordPress for small to medium sized companies.

items.title: PBL Group Supervisor
items.description: I supervise a group of younger students during their PBL meetings.

items.title: IT-bolaget Per & Per
items.description: I worked mainly with client-rendered maps with WebGL, protobuf and JavaScript.

items.title: Lab Assistant
items.description: An introductory course in web programming with python and Flask as a back-end.

items.title: Head of Corporate Relations
items.description: I worked with a group to create possibilities for companies and students to meet.

items.title: Nynas AB
items.description: Planning and dispatch. I helped with planning transportations via tank trucks and bigger boats.

items.title: Master of Science in Information Technology
